message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product. I believe it will be a great addition to your collection. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I am interested in the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $10000.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand you'd like to negotiate the price. I'm willing to consider your offer, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $11000. What do you think?
